text: Great service. Items are relatively cheaper than other stores. Has good variety of products too.
Was recommended some hair products for my dry frizzy hair. Eric was helpful in recommending these products for my hair. Hope the products can help nourish my hair well.
Retail staffs are very friendly. Currently trying Botanix Shampoo which has bn recommend by the staff. Will come back again for its good routine care.
Excellent service. Items are much cheaper than other stores. Has good variety of products too. Always my stop to buy daily essentials.
Staff July and Eric very pro active and friendly  they recommended me the product Natural Source shampoo n conditioner for my damaged hair kudos to VB for having staff like them
